version.description: The current version of this module. Example: 1.2.7

main.description: The main class name of this module, must extend CloudModule

description.description: A short, human readable description of what this module does

website.description: A url of the website of this module

depends.description: A list with modules names which have to be loaded before this

environment.description: The environment on which the module should be run

copy.description: The type of the service the module should be copied to as plugin
